attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Whilst instinct compels us to trust the Prime Minister's motives, we need him to present his arguments in a credible manner, without rhetoric, but as himself, and to know that he is willing to debate matters with his talented staff objectively. Furthermore we need to see an end to the waste of energy spent in aggrandisement of this party over that, and begin involving talent in a cross-party initiative to end the petty bickering which consumes too much public time and money. There is serious work to be done.Time to end this posturing and grow up.

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
